subject: Baseball
Deaths (Obituaries)
Franchises
Football
lead_paragraph: Mr. Howsam’s career as a sports executive spanned half a century. He founded the Denver Broncos and later built the Cincinnati Reds’ championship teams known as the Big Red Machine.
snippet: Mr. Howsam’s career as a sports executive spanned half a century. He founded the Denver Broncos and later built the Cincinnati Reds’ championship teams known as the Big Red Machine.
